artnaturals Vitamin C Face Cleanser

Brand: Artnaturals

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Caprylyl Glycol, Solanum Lycopersicum (Tomato) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Vaccinium Macr

ride, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Healianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (Vitamin C), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Lycopene, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrict
